description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+13 vs AC; 1d12+9 damage (plus and additional 2d12 damage on a critical hit).

At-Will ✦ Divine, Radiant, Weapon

Standard

+13 vs AC; 1d12+9 radiant damage. If Jaryn marked the target, he deals an additional 3 damage.

DivineThunderWeapon

Standard

Trigger: When first bloodied

+13 vs AC; 2d12+9 thunder damage, and the target is knocked prone. Can score a critical hit against a marked enemy on a roll of 19-20.

At-Will ✦ Divine, Weapon

Standard

+13 vs AC; 1d12+9 radiant damage; Jaryn gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to +1 per enemy adjacent to him.

At-Will ✦ Divine, Radiant

Minor, At-Will

Close burst 5

Targets one creature; the target is marked until Jaryn uses this power against another target. If the target makes an attack that doesn't include Jaryn as a target, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and 6 radiant damage.

Encounter ✦ Divine

Minor

Jaryn applies his Strength bonus (+5) as extra damage on his next attack this turn.

Immediate Reaction

When Jaryn is hit by a melee attack, he makes a basic attack.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Jaryn spends a healing surge and regains 41 hit points. He gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.

Speed 6

Cha 12 (+5)
Languages Common, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Senses
Passive Perception 17 | Insight 17

Equipment +2 vicious greatsword
